circumstances: Following a normal landing at Sydney Airport, the crew completed the braking procedure then vacated the runway and was taxiing to the apron when control was lost. The airplane collided with the main terminal building and came to rest. All 18 occupants escaped uninjured while the aircraft was damaged beyond repair.
probable_cause: Loss of control during taxiing after both braking systems and nosewheel steering system failed simultaneously for unknown reasons.
